title: Initial Download
body: This is the first time I'm installing LOL on my mac and the percentage keeps stopping and says "Applying Patches" is there any way to fix that so it will install?

replies.body: I'd recommend just letting the patching process do it's thing for a little while. You may need to let it just download for a few hours, depending on your network speeds. If you end up seeing an *Unspecified Error Occurred* or any similar error messages, let me know.
